<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/smartmutex">SmartMutex</a> - A mutex with a compile time constant parameter that indicates whether this mutex should become a no-op when we&#39;re not running in multithreaded mode. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/smartmutex/#details">More...</a>
